dcterms:creator: 3rd Generation Partnership Project
dcterms:description: Specifications detailing the physical channels and modulation for E-UTRA, which is essential for understanding the communication protocols used in LTE networks.
dcterms:title: 3GPP specifications for E-UTRA physical channels and modulation

dcterms:creator: X. Li
Y. Li
H. Han
X. Guo
dcterms:description: A dataset related to a joint SUCR protocol and timing advance information pilot random access scheme, which is relevant for enhancing random access procedures in communication networks.
dcterms:title: A joint SUCR protocol and TA information pilot random access scheme

dcterms:creator: H. Han
X. Guo
Y. Li
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on high throughput pilot allocation strategies for machine-to-machine (M2M) communication in crowded massive MIMO systems, addressing challenges in resource allocation.
dcterms:title: A high throughput pilot allocation for M2M communication in crowded massive MIMO systems

dcterms:creator: M. Zhang
Y. Li
X. Guo
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a novel random access scheme specifically designed for stationary machine-type communication devices, enhancing access efficiency.
dcterms:title: A novel random access scheme for stationary machine-type communication devices

dcterms:creator: T.-O. Luis
P.-P. Diego
P. Vicent
M.-B. Jorge
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the application of reinforcement learning for access class barring in LTE-A networks, focusing on managing massive machine-to-machine and human-to-human communications.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement learning-based ACB in LTE-A networks for handling massive M2M and H2H communications

dcterms:creator: G. Gui
H. Huang
Y. Song
H. Sari
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates the use of deep learning techniques to enhance non-orthogonal multiple access schemes, aiming for improved communication efficiency.
dcterms:title: Deep learning for an effective non-orthogonal multiple access scheme

dcterms:creator: N. Ye
X. Li
H. Yu
A. Wang
W. Liu
X. Hou
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on deep learning techniques applied to grant-free non-orthogonal multiple access, specifically targeting reliable low-latency access in tactile Internet of Things applications.
dcterms:title: Deep learning aided grant-free NOMA toward reliable low-latency access in tactile internet of things

dcterms:creator: T. N. Weerasinghe
I. A. M. Balapuwaduge
F. Y. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a preamble reservation based access scheme designed for grouped massive machine-type communication devices with ultra-reliable low latency communication requirements.
dcterms:title: Preamble reservation based access for grouped mMTC devices with URLLC requirements
